protocol.text: Untreated seedlings were used for tissue
Seedlings were raised on 1/2 MS medium without antibiotic selection for 21 days.
Trizol extraction of total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 5ug total RNA
Following fragmentation, 15 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip Arabidopsis Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450
GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix Gene Chip Scanner 3000

First-order analysis was performed using Affymetrix Gene Chip Operating (GCOS) software 1.2.1. Normalization of data and differential expression analysis was done using Array Assist software (Strandgenomics, Bangalore, India)
